block.p: MILLER--Florence, died peacefully on June 12, 2007 at the age of 101. Beloved wife of the late Rabbi Irving Miller. Cherished mother of Naomi Weinberg and the late David and Joseph Miller. Dear mother-in-law of Terry Miller and the late Norman Weinberg. Devoted grandmother of Cantor Ellen Weinberg, Judith (Sheldon) Kanfer, Jonathan Weinberg (Jessica Litman), and Amanda, Tiffany, and Austin Miller. Adored great-grandmother of Yedida, Nachliel, Malachi and Ari. Services Thursday, 1pm at the ''Riverside-Nassau North Chapels'', 55 North Station Plaza (opposite the LIRR), Great Neck, NY.
